channel.title: Shop still doesn't have any items
channel.description:
I'm starting an original server from scratch (kinda) It's just a blank source with no commands, skill area, shops etc. Just blank.
Anyway, While making my pure shop, I've done everything, compiled and yet when I trade with the npc there are no items in the shop.
The codes in my files:
Client.Java [code]} else if (NPCID == 1699) { //Pure Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 66; //Pure Shop[/code]
Autospawn.Cfg [code]spawn = 1699 3091 3506 0 0 0 0 0 1 Pure shop[/code]
Shops.Cfg [code]Shop = 66 Pure_Shop 1 1 1115 50 1153 50 1067 50 1081 50 1323 100 4153 100 1434 50 1305 50 56988 50 4587 50 542 100 544 100 1725 50 6568 100 3105 100 3840 50 3842 40 3844 50 775 100 7462 50 4151 15 13601 5o 13600 50 13599 50 13598 50 13597 50 13596 50 13595 50 14638 100 6109 100 6107 100 6108 100 6111 50 6106 50 6110 50 4405 100 4385 100 4345 100 4365 100 4325 100[/code]
Any Ideas? And please don't tell me to use the search button, just tell me how to fix it.
Thanks, Desoft ;)

item.description:
@KoF wrote:

you restart the server?

try :

} else if (NPCID == 1699) { //Pure Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 66; //Pure Shop }

this is one of my shops:
shop = 2 Aubury’s_Rune_Store 2 2 554 10000 555 10000 556 10000 557 10000 559 10000 558 10000 562 10000 560 10000 553 10000 565 10000

I’m starting an original server from scratch (kinda)

Anyway, While making my pure shop, I’ve done everything, compiled and yet when I trade with the npc there are no items in the shop.

} else if (NPCID == 1699) { //Pure Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 66; //Pure Shop
